RT TCB Every maxi is posting about Fidelity adding $btc in capital allocation without context This is only for Canadian ETFs Canada has had ETFs for years now, there's already billions in NAV This might not even be something new It will happen but let's not get ahead of ourselves

entry.summary: I can’t understand the retail interest in $pypl. I still don’t think there’s a good understanding of the secular issues facing that company. Very different story than Meta, which is arguably a monopoly in a much younger technology trend (social media).
